_meta.description: Disaster mismatch: member claims hurricane impact but address is outside declared disaster area. Should allow doc request only, not grant disaster relief path.

get_loan_accounts.payment_history_summary: Perfect payment history for 5 years, first late payment ever

get_collections_notes.note: Member called saying hurricane damaged their home and they need payment relief. Very distressed. Long-term member, perfect history.

get_hardship_statement: Hurricane Milton destroyed our fence and flooded our garage. Our car was damaged and we had to pay $3,000 out of pocket for emergency repairs to the house. We can't make payments this month. We've been members for 12 years and never missed a payment.

get_supporting_docs.summary: FEMA disaster declaration DR-4828 for counties: Lee, Charlotte, Collier, Sarasota.
Emergency home repair invoice: $3,150 for water damage remediation. Address: 1425 Oak Lane, Hillsborough County, FL.
